entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
